search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

Recommendations.Title: Missed Bin Collections
Key Strengths: Direct link to report missed bin collection
Recommendations.Reasoning: The title and snippet suggest that this is the most direct way for a resident to report a missed bin collection.

Recommendations.Title: Report
Key Strengths: Includes options for reporting various issues, not only missed bin collections
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not specifically a link for missed bin collections, the page does include this option and is still likely to lead to the desired outcome.

Recommendations.Title: Search
Key Strengths: Allows for a wider search for topics related to missing services
Recommendations.Reasoning: The search function will likely lead to the missed bin collection page if that is what the user is searching for.

Recommendations.Title: A-Z of Services
Key Strengths: Offers a comprehensive list of services, including those related to reporting problems
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not as direct, this page may lead the user to the correct service for reporting missed bin collections.

Recommendations.Title: Complaint Form
Key Strengths: A comprehensive form for reporting various complaints, including missed bin collections
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not specific to missed bin collections, the complaint form provides an avenue for resolving the issue.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results primarily consist of links related to reporting problems, including missed bin collections. However, some results are more general in nature and may require additional navigation or research.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The recommendations provided prioritize direct and specific links for reporting missed bin collections. Some general options were included due to their relevance to the issue at hand.
